title: Meowser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Fluffy**: Guard 1 (2 when all Koopas alive) Koopas, Giving them Powerful defense and immunity to all negative effects for this night.
- **Distract**: Redirect up to 4 players to targets of your choice. (1 uses, +1 use after day 5)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, A random player who visited a Guarded player will have their role and name revealed if they aren't from your Faction.
- All Koopas may talk in the factional chat, even if you are alive.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

desc:
Post 1815
*Meowser can climb walls and swipe his claws at his enemies. Unlike Cat Mario, however, his tail is large enough to whip*
